author: John Falkenberg
title: Milo Gets Last Word After Statistics Show EPIC Trend Following UC Berkeley Riots
text:
WATCH: Libs Furious When Arab Co-Ed Hijacks Speech, Tells Truth on Muslim Refugees 
Like, a 12,740 percent overnight increase from Thursday to Friday. 
The book, titled “Dangerous,” is one of the top selling books on Amazon based on pre-orders, and, according to Zero Hedge, the book isn’t even going to be released until March 14. 
It appears that Milo will have the last laugh. Advertisement - story continues below 
Even in terms of his message, this is fantastic news. Being shut out of Berkeley is not good, but the media coverage that the left brought to him will see to it that the guy is more popular than ever. 
His views will be read about, discussed, and shared exponentially more because a huge portion of the left can’t stand the idea of actual, genuine free speech . 
Not only that, but millions of Americans are now keenly aware of how the liberals that infest UC Berkeley behave when they don’t get their way. It’s unacceptable, destructive, and childish. 
When will the left learn that rioting isn’t the way to get what you want? Advertisement - story continues below
